questions.question: Considering the overall form and upholstery, what is the primary style of this sofa?
What is the dominant color of the fabric covering the entire sofa?
Describing the texture of the upholstery fabric, is it smooth or rough?
What is the shape of the armrests on the sides of the sofa?
What is the discernible pattern formed by the upholstery tufting?
Focusing on the sofa's base, what material are the legs made of?
What is the color of the visible wooden legs at the base?
Based on its appearance, how many distinct seating areas does this sofa have?
Considering the overall construction, is the sofa design ornate or minimalistic?
What is the visible type of stitching or joining method evident on the sofa?
What kind of material is primarily used in the construction of the sofa's cushions?
What is the most prominent design element on the back and seat of the sofa?
Describing the sofa's overall contour, what is its shape?
What is the general appearance of the sofa's fabric in terms of glossiness?
Considering the visible details, does the sofa give an impression of being modern or traditional?
